searchParameters.q: how much is black jade worth

answerBox.snippet: Is Black Jade Expensive? The black jade gem is indeed an expensive stone. Black jade cost per carat ranges at about $3 million USD for the jadeite variant. In the case of the nephrite variant of black jade crystal, the price is relatively less since it is more commonly found.

organic.title: What is the most expensive type of black jade someone can buy?
organic.snippet: Black jade is commonly used for the backs of opal doublets. It's not especially rare or expensive.

peopleAlsoAsk.question: Is dark jade worth anything?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: For jadeite, the intensity of the green color, combined with a high degree of translucency are the key factors in judging value. Stones which are too dark in color or not so translucent are less highly valued.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Jade Buying Guide | Jade Auction Records - Lotus Gemology

peopleAlsoAsk.question: How can you tell if black jade is real?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: You verify jade by doing hardness AND specific gravity tests. But black jade is not anything super rare or special. It can be used like onyx as a strong backing for doublets and triplets.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Is black jade a thing and how do I verify? : r/Gemstones - Reddit

peopleAlsoAsk.question: Is black jade more valuable?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Black Jade Value Jadeite black jade could get up to around $3 million for every carat. Nephrite jade costs around $100 to $1000 for every pound, for it is easily found.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Black Jade Meaning Properties Benefits Uses - Aurora Gems

peopleAlsoAsk.question: What color jade is most expensive?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Jadeite comes in a wide range of colors. The most valuable is an intense green called Imperial.
